title: Why not give portraits as profile icons for champion mastery
body:
You know, these {{champion:103}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:67}}. No reason not to give someone that for champion level 5. Just a nice little prize for the grind, and a way to show off your favorite champion.

And it'd be even cooler if we also got ones for any skins we owned, too. Although they would require a little more effort (as opposed to using the normal portraits which every champ already has).

It primarily depends on the length of the match (the longer the match, the more champion mastery points you'll earn), you're KDA ratio, turrets destroyed, etc. Pretty much all of your stats along with a victory/loss, and the time the match lasted will count towards how many champion mastery points you earn; that determines how fast you level up your champion.
